description.en-us: BIGTREETECH Manta M8P V2.0 is a 32-bit 3D printer control board designed for use with Klipper firmware. It allows direct installation of a core board to run Klipper, greatly simplifying connections to a Raspberry Pi and saving space in the electronics enclosure.
description.zh-cn: BIGTREETECH Manta M8P V2.0是一款专为配合Klipper固件设计的32位3D打印机控制板。它支持直接安装核心板运行Klipper系统，极大简化了与树莓派的连接流程，同时节省了走线空间。
